testsuite.name: CoffeeMachineTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of moneyWrite action (buy, fill, take): > take I gave you $550 The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of moneyWrite action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: > 1 The coffee machine has: 150 of water 540 of milk 104 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of moneyWrite action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: > 2 The coffee machine has: 50 of water 465 of milk 100 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of moneyWrite action (buy, fill, take): > buy What do you want to buy? 1 - espresso, 2 - latte, 3 - cappuccino: > 3 The coffee machine has: 200 of water 440 of milk 108 of coffee beans 8 of disposable cups ?[1;31m Start test 5?[0m The coffee machine has: 400 of water 540 of milk 120 of coffee beans 9 of disposable cups 550 of moneyWrite action (buy, fill, take): > fill Write how many ml of water do you want to add: > 2001 Write how many ml of milk do you want to add: > 510 Write how many grams of coffee beans do you want to add: > 101 Write how many disposable cups of coffee do you want to add: > 21 The coffee machine has: 2401 of water 1050 of milk 221 of coffee beans 30 of disposable cups
